title: David Made King Over Israel
summary: David is anointed king over all Israel at Hebron. He captures Jerusalem (then called Jebus) and makes it his capital. The chapter lists Davidâ€™s mighty warriors, highlighting their bravery and loyalty.

faq.question: Where was David crowned king?
faq.answer: At Hebron, by all the elders of Israel.

faq.question: Why is Jerusalem important here?
faq.answer: Because David conquered it and made it the political and spiritual center of Israel.
